LanguageData.CrystalCanUseOnlyCat: The cat crystal can only be used against cats.
LanguageData.CrystalCanUseOnlyAlly: The cat crystal can only be used on allies.
LanguageData.BellCanUseOnlyAlly: The cat bell can only be used on allies.
LanguageData.BellCannotUseThis: The cat bell cannot be used on this target.
LanguageData.ExC_BreakRelation: The relationship between {0} and {1} was broken by a mysterious force.
LanguageData.HarvestPartyText: A harvest festival was held by the mysterious power of the cat.\nThe festival begins with prayers for a bountiful harvest of crops and thanksgiving to nature.
